title: Hey guys, been a while
body:
Most of you probably don't know me, which is likely a good thing. However I was wondering how you are all doing?

I have been ok, I have been in a new community and have had lots of fun there but I thought I would come drop by

replies.body:
Yes, you still hang around here I see, 

haha
Yes, I stop in from time to time when I'm thinking of getting back into LoL again. A few minutes of reading banal horseshit on here reminds me that it's a waste of my time.
Well are you not posting banal horse shit yourself?
